name: Homecraft - Home Design Game
description:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own interior design studio? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest home design game, Homecraft! Do your best to satisfy your client's design request while staying true to your interior decorator intution. Become the master homecrafter of your neighborhood... your city... your country ... your world!

Solve match 3 puzzle levels and unlock hundreds of new decor items to help your clients create their dream home! The final design is entirely up to you!

FEATURES
* 100s of different home decor items
* Home design simulation with match 3 puzzle challenges
* Unique homes and clients
* Unlock rewards as you polish your design skills as an interior decorator
* Cute story and relaxing gameplay

Download and start homecrafting now!
